overview: Alba and Mart√≠n embark on a trip to the southeast of Spain. They make a stop at an isolated farmhouse in the middle of the desert, whose esplanade is full of furniture and objects for sale. As they silently observe these relics belonging to broken relationships, they perceive the nostalgia for a feeling already exhausted, whose last throes show them that their journey is a flight forward.
title: Amanece
